name: Climbing
description: is used to scale walls, catch ledges and second story work.

name: Athletics
description: is used when leaping long distances, swimming, and running fast.

name: Reflexes
description: are used when dodging attacks and reacting quickly to situations.

name: Wildsense
description: is used when calming wild animals, or working out their moods.

name: Handling
description: is used when keeping control of a mount or taming a creature.

name: Tracking
description: is used to follow creatures, even Gelfling, through the wilderness.

name: Finesse
description: is used when attacking in a dexterous way, good for swift opponents.

name: Marksmanship
description: is used when shooting or throwing a weapon.

name: Ferocity
description: is used to put all your force into attacks and use heavy weapons.

name: Ancients
description: is used when remembering old stories or read ancient runes.

name: Vliyaya
description: is used when trying to deremine the magical nature of a device.

name: Healing
description: is used when tending to your allies' wounds, and identifying maladies.

name: Fortitude
description: is used when enduring great strain, or resisting injury.

name: Strength
description: is used when trying to force doors, bend bars, or cut down trees.

name: Block
description: is used when shielding yourself or others from harm.

name: Sneaking
description: is used when trying to move unseen and unheard.

name: Awareness
description: is used when spotting small details, or hearing quiet sounds.

name: Skulduggery
description: is used when using sleight of hand, or operating machinery.

name: Charm
description: is used when getting others to see your point of view, or tell a fib.

name: Artistry
description: is used when dancing, playing music, or creating beautiful things.

name: Empathy
description: is used when trying to determine emotions or motivations.
